Image Process also makes it easy to create responsive images using the new HTML5

trans-unit.source: Image Process can be use to generate the images used by a
Image Process is a plugin for Pelican, a static site generator written in Python.
trans-unit.target: Image Process是Pelican的插件，Pelican是用Python编写的静态网站生成器。

trans-unit.source: Image Process let you automate the processing of images based on their class attribute. Use this plugin to minimize the overall page weight and to save you a trip to Gimp or Photoshop each time you include an image in your post.
trans-unit.target: 图像处理使您可以基于图像的类属性自动处理图像。使用此插件可最大程度地减少页面总重量，并在每次在帖子中添加图片时节省您去Gimp或Photoshop的路程。

trans-unit.source: Image Process requires Beautiful Soup, Pillow, Six, and Pelican. All these can be manually installed with pip:
trans-unit.target: 图像处理需要美丽的汤，枕头，六块和鹈鹕。所有这些都可以通过pip手动安装：

trans-unit.source: Image Process will not overwrite your original images.
trans-unit.target: 图像处理不会覆盖您的原始图像。

trans-unit.source: By default, the new images will be stored in a directory named
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,新的图像将存储在一个名为

trans-unit.source: Crop the image to the box (left, top)-(right, bottom). Values can be absolute (a number) or relative to the size of the image (a number followed by a percent sign
trans-unit.target: 将图像裁剪到框（左，上）-（右，下）。值可以是绝对值（数字），也可以是相对于图像大小的值（数字后跟百分号）

trans-unit.source: For consistency with the other type of transformations described below, there is an alternative syntax for the processing instructions:
trans-unit.target: 为了与下面描述的其他类型的转换保持一致,处理指令有一个替代语法。

trans-unit.source: For details, refer to the BeautifulSoup documentation on parsers.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅解析器上的BeautifulSoup文档。

trans-unit.source: HTML5 supports two types of responsive image set. The first one is device-pixel-ratio-based, selecting higher resolution images for higher resolution devices; the second one is viewport-based, selecting images according to the viewport width. If you want to know more about HTML5 responsive images, I recommend this article for a gentle introduction to the
trans-unit.target: HTML5支持两种类型的响应式图像集。第一个是基于设备像素比率的，为更高分辨率的设备选择更高分辨率的图像。第二个是基于视口的，根据视口的宽度选择图像。如果您想了解有关HTML5自适应图片的更多信息，建议您这篇文章对

trans-unit.source: If the transformed image already exists and is newer than the original image, the plugin assumes that it should not recompute it again. You can force the plugin to recompute all images by setting
trans-unit.target: 如果转换后的图像已经存在,并且比原始图像新,插件就会认为它不应该再次重新计算。您可以通过设置为 "重新计算 "来强制插件重新计算所有图像。

trans-unit.source: If you encounter errors while processing JPEG files, you may need to install the JPEG development library:
trans-unit.target: 如果你在处理JPEG文件时遇到错误,你可能需要安装JPEG开发库。

trans-unit.source: The simplest image processing will replace the original image by a new, transformed image computed from the original. You may use this, for example, to ensure that all images are of the same size, or to compute a thumbnail from a larger image:
trans-unit.target: 最简单的图像处理会用一个从原始图像计算出来的新的、经过转换的图像来替换原始图像。例如,您可以使用这种方法来确保所有图像的大小相同,或从较大的图像中计算出缩略图。
